span.p:
Legend:
- Blue: Services/processes
- Teal border: file-based queues
- White: datastore/cache
- Arrows: data/control flow
Accessibility: high-contrast palette, short node labels, consistent casing

div.style: color: rgb(11, 37, 69) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Atomic writes: write to tmp file + os.rename to prevent corruption
(implemented in SmallModel & MainModel)
